DataElement.preferredDefinition: The date substance use started represented in an unambiguous date format (e.g., DD-MON-YYYY).

ReferenceDocuments.name: What was the start date of [S
ReferenceDocuments.description: What was the start date of [SUTRT/SUCAT] use/consumption?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Case Report Form
ReferenceDocuments.description: Record the start date of the substance use using this format (DD-MON-YYYY).

ReferenceDocuments.name: SUSTDTC
ReferenceDocuments.description: This does not map directly to an SDTMIG variable. For the SDTM submission dataset, concatenate all collected CDASH START DATE and TIME components and populate the SDTMIG variable SUSTDTC in ISO 8601 format.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CDASH Implementation Notes
ReferenceDocuments.description: The sponsor may choose to capture a complete date or any variation thereof (e.g., month & year or year, etc.).
